reviewText: Ellen Barret is wonderful and I love these workout DVDs. She's very enthusiastic and her cuing is always perfect. She does have a tendency to be a little repetitive, though. Her workouts are ideal for people like me who are new to Pilates.
These are my absolute favorite workouts. The crunch super slim down is by far the best workout DVD that I own, I do it everyday and I love it.
The Crunch series is fantastic. So I was really happy to find these bundled together for a reasonable price. Now I have more than enough exercise videos to keep me going!
I really love the "Crunch" series...this is a great combo pack! I used to do this series on my TV through net flix, now I can do it anywhere.

I used these videos on Netflix until they were removed. I was totally bummed since I just had a baby and wanted to work out again with something I was comfortable doing. I recently found them at Target for $14.99!!!
Ellen is a great trainer. She continually reminds you to hold your posture, which makes her work out most effective. The moves aren't difficult either. She starts every new move slowly. I hate videos that make you feel like you can't keep up or have complicated moves that just make me mad....
